meanings.definition: To engage in battle or physical combat.
meanings.sent1: The knights will fight the dragon to protect the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers will fight bravely for their country.
meanings.sent3: The children pretend to fight like superheroes in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Every day, we fight against our fears to become stronger.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's determination to fight for the championship was inspiring.

meanings.definition: To struggle or strive against someone or something.
meanings.sent1: I will fight my fear of heights to climb the mountain.
meanings.sent2: She had to fight against the strong wind to reach the top.
meanings.sent3: The student had to fight the urge to procrastinate and focus on studying.
meanings.sent4: He fought against the current to swim back to shore.
meanings.sent5: The team will fight hard to win the championship title.

meanings.definition: A physical confrontation between two or more individuals.
meanings.sent1: The fight between the two wrestlers was intense.
meanings.sent2: A crowd gathered to watch the street fight.
meanings.sent3: The siblings had a playful pillow fight before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: The fight in the movie was choreographed beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The fans cheered loudly during the boxing fight.
